titles: Prouision for the poore, novv in penurie Out of the store-house of Gods plentie: which they shall be sure to find in all places, that are indued with his graces, to thinke seriously on this sentence following. Explaned by H.A.
author: H. A. (Henry Arthington)
notes: The "sentence following" on the title page is a Biblical quotation.
Reproduction of the original in the Harvard University. Library.
